synopsis.text:
Ao High's Rhythmic Gymnastics Club is preparing for the biggest event of their lives: the Inter-High Championship. After qualifying for regionals for the first time, the team is determined to claim the title, with the final tournament for their third-year members looming. As they practice and perfect their routine, the pressure mounts, and personal troubles threaten to derail their dreams.

Shotaro Futaba, a new member of the club, is captivated by the world of boys' rhythmic gymnastics. He joins the unique group of seniors at Ao High, including the team's ace, Ryoya Misato, and together they embark on a journey towards their ultimate goal.

With a shared passion for the sport, the team of six misfits dedicates their youth to achieving greatness. But as they face challenges and frustrations, they must work together to overcome their obstacles and shine on the biggest stage of all. This is a story of sports, youth, and the unbreakable bond formed by a love of rhythmic gymnastics.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
